author: Paige McCune
description: An unusual pairing of single malt scotch whisky and tequila with herbal complexity courtesy of Bénédictine liqueur, freshened with orange zestiness.
name: Sloane Square cocktail
recipeIngredient: 40 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
